Onix (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0094: Gengar
Pokémon
#0096: Drowzee →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Onix (TCG Pocket).

Onix has been featured on 28 different cards since it debuted in the Base Set of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Onix cards are normally Fighting-type Basic Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Onix

Onix
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
